title: remotemass
author: remotemass
content: Can someone please show a good example of how does a bitcoin transaction looks like it terms of of its markup, ideally using different colors for different parts and pieces of that code to highlight the main features of a bitcoin transaction and the features that make it a signed bitcoin transaction?I can send a good tip for a good answer. Just ask for it and I kindly send you a tip if it is the case of your answer deserving it and you are keen on it.
